# shinyapp tests

Testing out rintrojs with multiple tabs.

## Installation

You can install the development version of shinyapps from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ecoisilva/shinyapps")
```
